LanguageData.TSOA_MessageAnimaBranchDrop: Branches have fallen from a nearby anima tree. Deconstruct them to yield valuable resources.
LanguageData.TSOA_NotLinked: Not linked to an anima tree
LanguageData.TSOA_SetTapRangeDescription: Set the range that the tap will be active in. Will allow essence to build up until it hits the upper bound, then drain until it hits the lower bound.
LanguageData.TSOA_SapToggleEmptyingDescription: When active, colonists will automatically empty anima sap from the basin when it is more than half full.
LanguageData.TSOA_SapEmptyNowDescription: When active, colonists will priorize emptying the sap regardless of fullness.
LanguageData.TSOA_SapThresholdsTooltip: Drag to adjust the lower and upper percentage bounds.
LanguageData.TSOA_SapThresholdsInspect: Harvest when tree essence reaches {0}% then stop at {1}%.
